mapper.insert: insert into daum_movie( movie_name, movie_name_en, movie_id, rate, genre, movie_opening_date, running_time, overview, img_url, nation ) select #{movieName}, #{movieNameEn}, #{movieId}, #{rate}, #{genre}, #{movieOpeningDate}, #{runningTime}, #{overview}, #{imgUrl}, #{nation} FROM dual WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT movie_name, movie_name_en, movie_id, rate, genre, movie_opening_date, running_time, overview, img_url, nation FROM daum_movie WHERE movie_id = #{movieId} )
mapper.select: select * from daum_movie where movie_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%') OR movie_name_en LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')

select * from daum_movie where movie_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%') OR movie_name_en LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%') and img_url is not null and adult = false and count > 0 order by count desc, score desc, movie_opening_date desc limit #{page}, 30
select * from daum_movie order by score desc limit 10

select * from daum_movie where genre like CONCAT('%',#{genre},'%') and img_url is not null and adult = false and count > 0 and movie_opening_date is not null and running_time is not null and nation like '%한국%' order by score desc, rate desc, movie_opening_date desc limit 5

select * from daum_movie where genre like CONCAT('%',#{genre},'%') and img_url is not null and adult = false and count > 0 and movie_opening_date is not null and running_time is not null and nation not like '%한국%' order by score desc, rate desc, movie_opening_date desc limit 5
